price: Waɗan nan ne wɗan da suka yi hasãrar rãyukan su, kuma abin da suka kasance sunã ƙirƙirawa ya ɓace musu.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna khasirū anfusahum waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
